001package io.avaje.inject.aop;
002
003import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
004import java.lang.reflect.Method;
005
006/**
007 * Provides the {@code MethodInterceptor} for the given aspect.
008 *
009 * @param <T> The aspect annotation
010 */
011public interface AspectProvider<T extends Annotation> {
012
013  /**
014   * Return the method interceptor to use for the given method and aspect annotation.
015   */
016  MethodInterceptor interceptor(Method method, T aspectAnnotation);
017}
